name: L.O.L. Surprise! Movie Night
summary: L.O.L. Surprise! Movie Night is an all-new L.O.L. Surprise! Adventure, based on the new Movie Magic toy line. Aspire to become a movie star and glam it up with the latest fashion! Perform in a variety of activities and games and meet fierce friends along the way on your journey to becoming the best actress in L.O.L. Ville. You will need to practice your lines, enter your very own photoshoot, and explore different movie sets, all in your quest for a Star on L.O.L. Boulevard!

videos.name: Trailer
